attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to an ever increasing rise in arrests,crime and death do you think it is time for this carnival to be stopped.The locals do not want it and neither do the police with their bank holidays cancelled due to the high amount of crime that happens every year.how much does it cost the tax payer to host this farce?How many more people have to suffer before something is done?
